title: Repo sync
author: docs-bot
details: Added GitHub Actions workflow to prompt non-Docs contributors for feedback on merged PRs.
Enhanced storage capacity instructions with filesystem error recovery steps.
Updated Copilot custom agents: new `/agents` path for org/enterprise agents, visibility options (Internal/Private), and added testing/release guide.
Projects: Added default repository setting and updated quickstart guide.
Scheduled reminders now supported on GHES 3.17.
Redesigned home page hero with new image and styles.
summary:
- Added GitHub Actions workflow to prompt non-Docs contributors for feedback on merged PRs.
- Enhanced storage capacity instructions with filesystem error recovery steps.
- Updated Copilot custom agents: new `/agents` path for org/enterprise agents, visibility options (Internal/Private), and added testing/release guide.
- Projects: Added default repository setting and updated quickstart guide.
- Scheduled reminders now supported on GHES 3.17.
- GraphQL schema: Added `projectV2Ids` to `CreateIssueInput`.
- Redesigned home page hero with new image and styles.
generated_title: Enhance Copilot agents, project defaults, storage docs, and home hero; update schemas
commits: **e1e38bc**: Raise visibility to the requirement to use `/agents` for org/enterprise custom agents (#58301) (by Chuck Lantz)
**a3fc9e7**: New home hero design (#58364) (by Kevin Heis)
**47c3692**: Adds workflow to ask for contributor feedback (from non-Docs team) (#58376) (by Ben Ahmady)
**7f56ca8**: Enhance instructions for increasing storage capacity (#57819) (by Brice)
**b39f828**: Update versioning for Scheduled Reminders for GHES on Microsoft Teams and Slack [GA] (#58380) (by John Clement)
**25cb3e0**: Improved projects onboarding flow [GA] (#58155) (by John Clement)
original_description:
This is an automated pull request to sync changes between the public and private repos.
Our bot will merge this pull request automatically.
To preserve continuity across repos, _do not squash_ this pull request.
raw_analysis:
### Summary
- Added GitHub Actions workflow to prompt non-Docs contributors for feedback on merged PRs.
- Enhanced storage capacity instructions with filesystem error recovery steps.
- Updated Copilot custom agents: new `/agents` path for org/enterprise agents, visibility options (Internal/Private), and added testing/release guide.
- Projects: Added default repository setting and updated quickstart guide.
- Scheduled reminders now supported on GHES 3.17.
- GraphQL schema: Added `projectV2Ids` to `CreateIssueInput`.
- Redesigned home page hero with new image and styles.

### Title
Enhance Copilot agents, project defaults, storage docs, and home hero; update schemas
